testsuite.name: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should register a new user: POST /register

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should log in as the test user: POST /login

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should update the headline: PUT /headline

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should return the headline of the test user: GET /headline

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should return the headline of the requested user: GET /headline/user

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should return articles with newly posted article: POST /article

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should return all articles in the logged in user feed: GET /articles

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should return an article with correct pid: GET /articles/id

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: should return all articles with correct author: GET /articles/id

testcase.classname: Validate Registration, Login, Profile, and Article Functionality
testcase.name: shoud logout the test user: PUT /logout
